name: Dandy II Bench
description: Inspired by the original Dandy bench by KIFU PARIS, the Dandy II Bench is the ultimate luxury seating. The seating area is inlaid in cream shagreen and the frame, legs and sides of the bench are completely inlaid in bronze-patina brass. On the left and right side of the bench both armrests are upholstered in white vachette. Other versions are also available as part of the Dandy II Capsule. This bench is handmade and made up of cream shagreen, white vachette, and bronze-patina brass legs. It is advised to wipe clean with a soft, dry cloth.
